participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, Emily enjoys exploring new experiences and values family connections. She's passionate about music and often finds solace in her guitar.
participant_1.background: I am a fourth child who was once lucky enough to swim with manta rays. I'm not sure if my family would be accepting of me, but I hope they would be. I used to be able to run really fast. My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax. I enjoy playing guitar and video games.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Active and sociable, Michael takes pride in his fitness and enjoys spending quality time with friends and family. He has a zest for life and a love for celebrations.
participant_2.background: I like to enjoy some comfort food like spaghetti and meatballs when I'm not counting calories. I have won an Olympic medal. I like to stay active and learn new things in my free time. I take pride in my appearance. I love the Fourth of July because it's a day to celebrate our country and spend time with friends and family.

content.text: Hey! I'm not sure if you're familiar with the manta ray, but I once had the opportunity to swim with them in the ocean! It was an amazing experience.
I've actually seen a manta ray in the ocean before! They're so majestic and beautiful creatures.
They really are! I'm so glad I had the chance to see them up close.
What's your favorite type of food?
I love all kinds of food, but my favorite comfort food is probably spaghetti and meatballs.
Spaghetti and meatballs is delicious! I love it when it's made with fresh pasta.
Me too! I also love to make my own pasta sauce.
That's awesome! I don't have much time to cook, so I usually just order takeout or eat at restaurants.
I understand that. I usually cook at home, but I do like to go out to eat sometimes too.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to play guitar, watch TV, and video games.
Those all sound like fun activities! I love to play video games too.
What's your favorite video game?
I like all kinds of video games, but my favorite is probably Overwatch.
I've never played Overwatch, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a really fun game! It's a team-based shooter where you can play as different characters with different abilities.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I might have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a great game to play with friends.
I'll do that! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome
